variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using human induced pluripotent stem cells (hiPSCs) differentiated into primary neuronal cultures.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_024597.3:c.658C>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in quadruplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Tukey's multiple comparison test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 14.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 14.
